{include "affiliate_loader"} What's next for immigration policy under the Biden administration. {include "pre-header-spacing"}{beacon}

{include "default_salutation"} –

The Trump presidency was defined by a barrage of attacks on immigrant communities. With a change of administration rapidly approaching, what can we expect to see from President-elect Biden in the early days and from his administration when it comes to immigration?

Join the ACLU-WV and Mountain State Justice on Tuesday, January 19, to discuss the state of immigration policy after Inauguration Day. Hear from Immigration Attorney Katy Lewis, and ACLU-WV Executive Director Joseph Cohen.

Immigration After the Inauguration

Learn what's next for immigration policy under a new administration.

Tuesday, January 19, 7 – 8 p.m.
Online
